reuters.title: KENNER PARKER <KPT> CONCLUDES TWO SUITS
reuters.body: Kenner Parker Toys Inc's Parker Brothers said it obtained injunctions in two trademark infringement cases. One action was brought against Kits Games, which planned to market a game called Worldopoly, which was very similar to Kenner's Monopoly. The second case was brought against Citigames of America Inc which marketed a game called Hometown Monopoly. Reuter 
